name: Taggable-Player
tagline: HTML 5 Media Player with note taking feature
body: Taggable media player can be used to take notes while watching video. Linked with your gmail account, makes it easy to retrieve the notes every-time when watching the same video. Currently supported only in **Chrome**. ### Demo [Demo video](http://youtu.be/65it8dceNWk)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
